Sijana Mamos Interdisciplinary Data Scientist Operations & Team Leader

About Me Projects

Passionate about transitioning into Data Science and Machine Learning, with a strong foundation in cognitive science and computational neuroscience. I am actively seeking roles that allow me to apply my analytical and programming skills to solve complex problems. Currently enhancing my expertise in Python, machine learning algorithms, and data analysis through advanced coursework and hands-on projects.
